step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows relatively stable. Focus on making your fists tighter and really engaging your muscles as you inhale.
Your shoulder and elbow movements were good. Try to open your fingers wider and extend your arms a bit further out to the sides as you exhale.
Your shoulders and elbows are looking good. For the next repetitions, focus on fully relaxing your muscles as you exhale and open your hands.
Your shoulder and elbow alignment is strong. Ensure you are fully extending your arms horizontally and relaxing your muscles completely on the exhale.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are generally good. Pay close attention to fully opening your hands and relaxing your muscles as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to make tight fists and inhale while bringing your arms in. Then, exhale and fully open your hands while extending your arms out.
